data.message:
Can you tell me why I can't make a voice call?
Recently the voice call is not working.

replies.message: Hey, Julie. Thanks for bringing this to our attention. This sounds like a feature issue. Please help us track these issues and submit the problem to support through our Help Center: http://bit.ly/2dVPgUs. -Rhea

Facebook  i've been having problems with my group chat, like it does a weird glitch that doesn't allow me to scroll up and see the messages, any idea on how to fix this? also it seems my friend Teodora Lungu has been having a glitch on her facebook as well, so can u please help fix this?
